Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Angels have won each of their last four games as underdogs following a loss.
The Rangers have lost four of their last five games as home favorites against the Angels following a home win.
The Angels have covered the run line in each of their last five games following a loss.
The Rangers have failed to cover the run line in nine of their last 11 games as favorites following a win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers are tearing the cover off of the ball against righties right now.
The Angels send out Caden Dana for his second career start in this one.
Others: Chris Ruffolo has a proven system that combines multiple analytical and situational statistics and trends to give out thousands of winning picks over the last three years.
The Rangers are trying to win the series after their victory in Saturday’s matchup to take a series lead heading into the final game.
A series win would keep the Rangers’ playoff hopes going after series wins over the Yankees, A’s and White Sox over the last two weeks.
